title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: VR-Based Educational Game Development for Language Science Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific inquiry processes linked to language activities in VR environments

Learners can apply the three stages of the Educational Recontextualization Model (MER) – environment analysis, design trajectory, and educational potential extraction – when designing educational games
Learners can develop prototypes of science inquiry scenarios for language learning using simulation tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
